categories: Category:Star Wars: The Weapon of a Jedi

nodes.text: The Weapon of a Jedi, Part 3

"The Weapon of a Jedi, Part 3" (German: "Die Waffe eines Jedi, Teil 3") is the third installment of "Star Wars: The Weapon of a Jedi," a comic adaptation of Jason Fry's novel The Weapon of a Jedi: A Luke Skywalker Adventure. Written by Alec Worley and drawn by Ruairí Coleman, with colors by Chris O'Halloran, it was printed in issue 21 of "Star Wars - The Official Magazine" and published on July 19, 2017.
